fields.comment: this is the colors that get used for the pixels, if empty will use material colors
fields.name: pixel_scene_visual

fields.comment: this is the background file that gets loaded, if empty won't do anything
fields.name: pixel_scene_background

fields.comment: the standard z_index of pixel scene backgrounds
fields.name: background_z_index

fields.comment: how much off from the entity x,y will this be. Top left corner is where it loads the pixel scene
fields.name: offset_x

fields.comment: biome check is on by default - it will check that pixel scene is loaded so that every corner is in the same biome
fields.name: skip_biome_checks

fields.comment: if on - won't do the edge textures for the pixel scene
fields.name: skip_edge_textures
